title: In specific cases where URS is not bounded by roads, nallas and Railway lines, the boundary of the Cluster may be decided by the Officer appointed by the Planning Authority
clause_text: In specific cases where URS is not bounded by roads, nallas and Railway lines, the boundary of the Cluster may be decided by the Officer appointed by the Planning Authority. The Urban Renewal Cluster may consist of a mix of structures of different characteristics such as â€“ Cessed buildings in Island City, which attract the provisions of MHAD Act, 1976.
section: 33(9) (B): Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster of BDD chawls at Naigaon, Worli, N.M.Joshi Marg and Shivdi under Urban Renewal Scheme(s).
